official_title: A joint resolution designating April 9, 1987, as "Northeastern Pennsylvania Philharmonic Appreciation Day".

summary.text: Designates April 9, 1987, as Northeastern Pennsylvania Philharmonic Appreciation Day. Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation saluting the Philharmonic for its outstanding contributions to the cultural life of northeast Pennsylvania.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating April 9, 1987, as "Northeastern Pennsylvania Philharmonic Appreciation Day".
